title: Riptide
content: . As a stream of melting ice Flowing from the tip of my lips To the pit of my guts, Fear takes me whole and swallows me And I keep falling, Down and down its deeps; Fear of me, fear of you, Fear of this, of what it could be, Fear of what it means, and what it doesn't, Fear of what I have, fear of when we won't... Yet I choose to embrace Not only this fear but its beautiful frame too For just as a stream of melting ice It is so refreshing and makes me feel alive! .    No rhymes yet; perhaps one of these days...
contentWithMarkup:
.

As a stream of melting ice

Flowing from the tip of my lips

To the pit of my guts,

Fear takes me whole and swallows me

And I keep falling,

Down and down its deeps;

Fear of me, fear of you,

Fear of this, of what it could be,

Fear of what it means, and what it doesn't,

Fear of what I have, fear of when we won't...

Yet I choose to embrace

Not only this fear but its beautiful frame too

For just as a stream of melting ice

It is so refreshing and makes me feel alive!

.
No rhymes yet; perhaps one of these days...

feed.name: Tales of Ore
feed.description: Fantasy web novels, short stories and poetry by amateur writer Soar Vandergeid
